email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. I’m quoting a freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The freight rate is acceptable, but could we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains October 15-20? Regards, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. Summary: MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, Houston to Rotterdam, laycan October 15-20, freight rate $51.25 per metric ton, demurrage capped at $20,000 per day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah.
